categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith actors

nodes.text: Bruce Spence (born September 17, 1945) is a New Zealand-Australian actor, who portrayed Tion Medon, a Port Administrator, in Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith. He has a large fan base due to his participation in various film franchises such as Mad Max, Matrix and Lord of the Rings.
